meanings.definition: A machine that produces photographic typeset matter.
meanings.sent1: The phototypes at the printing press worked tirelessly to create newspapers.
meanings.sent2: The old printing shop used phototypes to make books and magazines.
meanings.sent3: The phototypes in the office had a habit of chatting with each other when no one was around.
meanings.sent4: The phototypes hummed softly as they transformed blank pages into stories.
meanings.sent5: The bright lights of the phototypes illuminated the room as they worked their magic.

meanings.definition: The process of producing photographic typeset matter.
meanings.sent1: Learning about phototypes helped the students understand how newspapers are made.
meanings.sent2: The phototypes process revolutionized the printing industry.
meanings.sent3: During the phototypes process, the machine suddenly sneezed, causing a paper jam.
meanings.sent4: The phototypes process was like a symphony of light and technology coming together.
meanings.sent5: Witnessing the phototypes process was like watching a dance of creativity and precision.
